doc.title: Microsoft Teams

application.doc: Microsoft Teams enables you to get all your content, tools and conversations in the Team workspace with Office 365.

doc.title: Select a Value
Create a Teams meeting Create a meeting with a link at the bottom of the invite to join the meeting online on Teams
List teams This operation retrieves a list of all the Teams (Office 365 Groups) you are a member of.
Add team ID
List channels This operation retrieves a list of all the channels for a specific Team.
Add team ID
Create a channel This operation is used to create a new channel for a specific Team.
Filter by type
Filter by whether or not the topic name is defined
List chats This operation retrieves a list of recent chats.
Add team ID
List all tags for a team This operation retrieves a list of tags.
Select an option
Choose notification type
Post a feed notification This operation posts a feed notification.
Add team ID
Add tag name
Get an @mention token for a tag This operation creates a token that can be inserted into a message or adaptive card sent as a user inS a channel to @mention a tag.
Add team ID
Add channel ID
Post a message (V2) This operation is used to post a message to a channel in a specific Team.
Add team ID
Add channel ID
Get messages This operation is used to get messages from a channel in a specific Team.
Add message ID
Choose message type
Get message details This operation gets details of a message in a chat or a channel.
Add team ID
Add channel ID
Post a message (V3) This operation is used to post a message to a channel in a specific Team.
Add team ID
Add channel ID
Add message ID
Post a reply to a message This operation is used to post a reply to a message in a channel in a specific Team.

Add channel ID
Add message ID
Post a reply to a message (V2) This operation is used to post a reply to a message in a channel in a specific Team.
Add team ID
Add channel ID
Post a message This operation is used to post a message to a channel in a specific Team.
Post a message as the Flow bot to a user Easily automate the process of sending a message to someone in Teams.
Post a message as the Flow bot to a channel Easily automate the process of posting a message to a Teams channel.
Add team ID
Post your own adaptive card as the Flow bot to a user Add the JSON card definition to create a custom message for a Teams user. The message can contain images, graphs, text, and more.
Post your own adaptive card as the Flow bot to a channel Add the JSON card definition to create a custom post for a Teams channel. The post can contain images, graphs, text, and more.
Add team ID
Post a choice of options as the Flow bot to a user Easily automate the process of sending a message to a Teams user that contains a set of options they must choose from before they respond.
Post an Adaptive Card to a Teams user and wait for a response Easily automate the process of sending a message to a Teams user that contains actions to continue a waiting flow.
Post an Adaptive Card to a Teams channel and wait for a response Easily automate the process of sending a message to a Teams channel that contains actions to continue a waiting flow.
Add team ID
Add team ID
Get a team This operation returns details for a team using the team's unique ID.
Specify a user principal or user ID to @mention
Get an @mention token for a user This operation creates a token that can be inserted into a message or adaptive card to @mention a user.
Add team ID
Shifts: List all Time Off reasons This operation returns the list of time off reasons associated with a team.
Total number of Time Off reasons to retrieve
Add team ID
Shifts: List all shifts This operation returns all shifts assigned to members of a team
yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ (UTC format)

The unique ID of the shift.

The unique ID of the shift.
Shifts: Delete a shift This operation deletes a shift using the shift's unique ID.
